players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Diana is dead. We need to discuss who we suspect and why. Alice, Charlie, what are your thoughts?"
You: "I'm shocked Diana is gone. We need to be careful not to jump to conclusions. Bob, why are you immediately asking for our thoughts? Seems a bit eager to direct suspicion."
Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and she is mafia. We must vote her out to win."

players.name: Bob
memory: You: "Diana is dead. We need to discuss who we suspect and why. Alice, Charlie, what are your thoughts?"
Alice: "I'm shocked Diana is gone. We need to be careful not to jump to conclusions. Bob, why are you immediately asking for our thoughts? Seems a bit eager to direct suspicion."
Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and she is mafia. We must vote her out to win."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice

players.name: Charlie
memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "Diana is dead. We need to discuss who we suspect and why. Alice, Charlie, what are your thoughts?"
Alice: "I'm shocked Diana is gone. We need to be careful not to jump to conclusions. Bob, why are you immediately asking for our thoughts? Seems a bit eager to direct suspicion."
You: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
You: "I investigated Alice last night and she is mafia. We must vote her out to win."
